pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany.

The Prime Minister congratulated Chancellor Merkel on the successful negotiation of a new coalition government. 

The Prime Minister and the Chancellor discussed steel and aluminum trade and the importance of the rules-based multilateral trading system.  They also discussed planning for the next G7 Summit, which Canada is hosting in Charlevoix, Quebec, on June 8 and 9, 2018, and undertook to continue close cooperation on G7 themes such as preparing for jobs of the future, advancing gender equality and womenâ€™s empowerment, and working together on climate change, oceans and clean energy.

The Prime Minister and the Chancellor discussed international peace and security issues.
